analysis.Summary: Defines a raw list of country metadata (name, ISO code, dial code, priority, area codes, flag) and exports a processed array of country objects formatted for phone input components.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a normalized list of countries with phone dialing information and flags for use in phone number input/select components within the project.

Components.name: allCountries
Components.description: An array of raw country data entries. Each entry is an array: [country name, ISO2 code, dial code, priority?, area codes?, flag emoji].

Components.name: default export
Components.description: A mapped version of allCountries where each item is an object with keys name, iso2, dialCode, priority, areaCodes, flag.

Functions.name: Array.prototype.map callback
Functions.description: Transforms each raw country array into a structured object.

properties.name: string – full country name
properties.areaCodes: Array|null – array of area codes or null

analysis.Usage: Imported as the default export wherever a phone input or country picker is needed. Example: import countries from 'components/FieldPhone/all-countries';
Notes: ISO2 codes are converted to uppercase for consistency.
Missing priority or areaCodes values default to 0 and null respectively.
Flag is always taken from the last element of each country entry.
No external libraries are required; pure data transformation.
